medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient experienced a sudden onset of constant, severe RUQ pain 12 hours before presentation. This pain followed a period of indigestion after consuming barbecue chicken and macaroni and cheese. He had a similar episode 6 weeks ago, which lasted for 4 hours and resolved. The current pain did not radiate, did not improve with ibuprofen, and could not be improved with any position. He reports the inability to eat, although he tolerated water. The pain progressed over 4 hours and was accompanied by increasing nausea and vomiting.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Passive acid reflux; left ear pain with chewing; left ear surgery for trauma in childhood.
medical_history.family_history: No family history of gallbladder or pancreatic disease. Mother died from an unspecified cancer. Father died from leukemia. Brother has diabetes mellitus, obesity, hypertension, and heart problems.
